item.title: CVE-2023-45228|2023-10-26T16:19:41.642Z -- sielco -- analog%20fm%20transmitter
item.description: The application suffers from improper access control when editing users. A user with read permissions can manipulate users, passwords, and permissions by sending a single HTTP POST request with modified parameters.
